Articles.Content: what does this thing indicate? anybody know?

Just some additional navball information:

NavBall Vectors:

* The Navball now shows all 6 vectors when in Orbit mode: Progade, Retrograde, Radial In/Out, Normal and Antinormal.

* Off-screen maneuver vectors now have an arrow which points towards them so they're easier to find.

The symbol type corresponds with the ones you pull on for maneuver nodes.

Just some additional navball information:

The symbol type corresponds with the ones you pull on for maneuver nodes.

many thanks. i figured it was normal/antinormal. that will come in great help when flying VTOLS
That particular one is actualy radial out. Normal is the purple triangle.
